attributes.action: Officially recognize Rugby Union as the number one national sport of England
attributes.additional_details:
1.) Grand Slam
2.) 3-0 against the Aussies
3.) National football team can't even beat a supermarket
4.) Rugby players are warriors
5.) Need I say more?
attributes.background: We have just completed a Grand Slam in the Six Nations, and trounced the Aussies 3-0 in their own back yard, the English Rugby Union team are looking as strong as they did in the glory days of 2003. And the national kickball team fail yet again, unable to even beat a supermarket...
